game.name: Jungle Jinx
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Set up camp deep in the jungle and begin your adventure! Explore lost ruins, collect artifacts, upgrade your gear, and grow your expedition. In Jungle Jinx, choose your path: dodge deadly traps, fight enemies, or race through the jungle on wild karts!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Set up camp deep in the jungle and begin your adventure! Explore lost ruins, collect artifacts, upgrade your gear, and grow your expedition. In Jungle Jinx, choose your path: dodge deadly traps, fight enemies, or race through the jungle on wild karts!
